item.description:
NEW VENUE - A space just for US!!

Special treat at McCormick & Schmick’s on October 24! The staff will be ready to greet you in the bar at 4:00 p.m. When you come in, you’ll all have the opportunity to enter for a chance to win a trip for two to the Pro Bowl™* in Hawaii, plus someone will win a $50 dining certificate sometime during the game.

McCormick & Schmick’s has a new Game Day Menu with items starting at just $2.25, not to mention great specials on Miller/Coors items. This new menu will be available throughout the season and includes four different preparations for shrimp, oysters both fried and on the half shell, calamari, sushi, fish tacos as well as more traditional game day favorites like wings and sliders.

McCormick & Schmick’s has recently upgraded thier A/V making it an the ideal place to watch a game.
item.name: NE Patriots vs. San Diego Chargers
